inclusion.criterion: ALT, alkaline phosphatase and bilirubin less than or equal to 1.5xULN
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Single QTc, QTcB or QTcF < 450 msec; or QTc < 480 msec in subjects with Bundle Branch Block
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Healthy as determined by a responsible and experienced physician
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Male or female between 18 and 65 years of age inclusive
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: A female subject is eligible to participate if she is of: Non-childbearing potential defined as pre-menopausal females with a documented tubal ligation or hysterectomy; or postmenopausal defined as 12 months of spontaneous amenorrhea
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Capable of giving informed consent, which includes compliance with the study requirements and restrictions listed in the consent form
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: BMI within the range 18 and 35 kg/m2 (inclusive)
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Able to use the inhaler devices adequately after training
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Subjects who have a current diagnosis or a history of asthma, excluding childhood asthma which has been discharged by physician
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Current or chronic history of liver disease, or known hepatic or biliary abnormalities
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: The patient has a history of asthma but it was discharged by physician. He is currently using inhaled corticosteroid and fluticasone 500 mcg/salmeterol 50 mcg, one puff twice daily.
